reviews.title: Highly recommended is this cozy, cozy terrace with delicious food and drinks!
reviews.text:
What a beautiful place and how warmly you will be welcomed by Petra and Arnold!
We had made a reservation for lunch for 47 adults and it was very well prepared as a buffet. Petra also had delicious homemade vegetable soup for us, various delicious sandwiches, croissants, fresh fruit, yoghurts, coffee, tea and different types of soft drinks. Plenty of choice for everyone.
Highly recommended, this lovely, cozy place!

articleContent.title: Your go-to guide for dog-friendly travel

seoInfo.metaDescription: Traveling with your dog has never been easier—or more fun. Cities across the country boast pet-friendly hotels, parks, and activities. With CESAR® brand’s mission to make the world more pet-friendly and Tripadvisor’s top-rated spots, you can plan with confidence. Whether it’s a quick getaway or a bucket-list trip, our guides help you stay, play, and explore with your pup. Grab the leash and go!
A local shares her top tips for visiting Male, the capital of the Maldives.

articleContent.title: 5 parades to check out in New Orleans—other than Mardi Gras

seoInfo.metaDescription: Sure Mardi Gras is a blast, but it's not the only parade in New Orleans worth seeing. Here are five other celebrations to check out.

tripContent.title: Orlando: An LGBTQ+ guide for families
tripContent.description: "As a two-mom family who has been traveling to Orlando five to six times a year, we see the city like a second home. We absolutely love the theme parks but Orlando has so much more to offer! We love experiencing Orlando's rich diversity, fantastic food, incredible art and culture, plus a fun soccer game here and there. Join me, Allison Mertzman, as I share some of my family's favorite Orlando attractions with you!" - Allison Mertzman

articleContent.title: 15 fun and unique things you can only do in Boston

seoInfo.metaDescription: For baseball fans, history buffs, and art lovers alike.

tripContent.title: Discover San Diego's top spots for family fun
tripContent.description: "We used Visit San Diego & Tripadvisor's AI trip generator to create the most fun, family adventure itinerary for our trip to San Diego! From thrill rides and fun games at Belmont Park and LEGOLAND California, to beautiful views at Mission Beach to activities at Mission Bay Resort. We played, explored, and enjoyed delicious meals at top restaurants. So many unforgettable family moments on this vacation!" —partyof4sometimes2

articleContent.title: 5 national parks that put accessibility first

seoInfo.metaDescription: Wheelchair rentals, accessible trails, Braille-ready park maps, and so much more.

articleContent.title: Trips beyond Tokyo: Discover the capital plus next-door wonders

seoInfo.metaDescription: Tokyo Prefecture offers a roster of delights year-round, from its neon shopping districts and vibrant food scene to its big-ticket attractions. But this sprawling metropolis has much more to experience, notably its prized Olympic legacy. Seize the opportunity to pop by former Olympic sites and relive history with exclusive behind-the-scenes tours.
